10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed narrated that:The Prophet was asked about musk and he said: "It is the best of your perfumes

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمِسْكِ لِلْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Using Musk when Washing The Dead
